title: Pasta with purple sprouting broccoli
description: Purple sprouting broccoli can be a cheap and cheerful ingredient for early spring dinners and goes brilliantly with anchovy and chilli.
ingredients: 1 medium sized fresh red chilli (not too hot)
1 small tin of anchovy fillets in olive oil, drained
350g/12oz pasta fusilli, oriecchiette, penne rigate or conchiglie are the most suitable shapes
4 tbsp freshly grated parmesan or hard pecorino cheese
